doc: <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>Shift</kbd>+<kbd>N</kbd> opens up a new, _non-maximized_ window on Windows.  This results in some graphical issues as described in #2936.
However, opening up a folder (which opens up a new window after the first time, which is a different bug-#3406) using <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>Shift</kbd>+<kbd>O</kbd> or Open in Atom works fine.
